messageBody:
Hi all. I trying to test some components. To do that I must initialize
the component container first. I don't want to do that in *every* test I
want to run and JUNIT prevents me to use a singleton ( != class loders
?? ) Any way I can implement a Singleton to be used by more than one
TestCase ?
